body.name: PURE CHAMP Mens 3 Pack Fleece Active Athletic Workout Jogger Sweatpants for Men with Zipper Pocket and Drawstring Size S-3XL
features: 3-pack of premium fleece joggers perfect for workout, running, sports or casual wear
Made of soft, comfortable 60% cotton, 40% polyester fleece fabric that is lightweight and breathable
Features an elastic waistband with drawstring, tapered legs, and zippered front pockets for security
Available in a variety of stylish color packs like black, charcoal, navy, olive and heather gray
Designed with a modern athletic fit, high rise, and stretchability for full range of motion
body.description: Pure Champ is a premium brand that focuses on delivering unique and versatile men’s and women’s activewear meant to add comfort and elegance to your everyday activities, without interfering with your personal style. We work exclusively with superior quality fabrics and trustworthy manufacturers, in order to meet the most rigorous standards and expectations of our worldwide customers. Encountering issues with your purchase? Our customer care department is entirely at your disposal and will immediately address your concerns! Premium Fleece Jogger Bottoms – A Must In Every Gentleman’s Wardrobe The Pure Champ lounge pants men perfectly combine comfort with style, allowing you to go about your casual activities feeling confident and good looking! Made with carefully selected skin-friendly fabrics, with a highly comfortable drawstring elastic waistline, flattering fit and optimal leg length, these men’s joggers sweatpants will nicely compliment your favorite t-shirt and sports footwear! Still not convinced? Here are some of the amazing features of these mens sweatpants: Arrives in convenient packs of 3; Available in 5 different color packs: black/heather gray/charcoal, black/navy/charcoal, black/heather/olive, black/natural/olive, black/black/black; Sizes: S-3XL; Material: 60% cotton, 40% polyester; 2 multifunctional front zippered pockets, 1 back pocket; super soft fleece feels great on your skin; Elastic waist for added comfort; Drawstring design; Modern and elegant fit; Ideal for running,walking, working out, daily activities; Original gift idea for him, best friend, husband, Father’s Day; Add a modern vibe to your casual outfits with these premium mens joggers with pockets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The joggers were exactly what I was looking for! They fit perfect 5’3 125# female and I got size small men’s) they’re thick and comfortable (soft inside) and have zipper pockets so I won’t lose things out of my pockets when I sit! And my 3 year old grand baby can’t pick pocket me! They’re good quality. So excited to wear these in the negative weather we’re having and be warm and comfy! Glad they’re affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go Outside! These Joggers Are Wonderful!
reviews.reviewText: In my dimly lit apartment, I peered out the kitchen window, yearning to explore the chilly outdoors. My wardrobe, however, lacked any suitable cold weather gear for my legs. "Total cringe," as my niece often says. Determined, I searched Amazon for "Fleece Active Athletic Workout Jogger Sweatpants for Men," attracted by the promises of warmth and mobility.When they arrived, I was impressed by the quality—sturdy yet flexible, with a soft fleece lining that promised warmth. They fit perfectly, allowing freedom of movement without sacrificing comfort. The deep pockets and snug waistband were thoughtful touches, emphasizing their design for active use.Venturing outside, the difference was clear. The cold no longer bit at my skin; instead, I was enveloped in warmth, moving with ease. These joggers transformed my outdoor experience, enabling me to enjoy the freedom of movement in the cold weather.Reflecting on this simple purchase, I was struck by how a small change could significantly impact my comfort and enjoyment outdoors. These joggers had not only met but exceeded my expectations, proving to be an invaluable addition to my winter wardrobe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, but order a size larger than you’d normally order
reviews.reviewText: These are great! They are very insulated, comfortable, and adjustable in the waist so you can tighten them accordingly. I’m 6’2, more lean, so I went with the mediums. They fit great in the waist, legs, all areas, the only issues I have are that the cuffs on the legs can be a bit tight and can make getting your foot through. They also are a bit shorter in the length department so just expect these to be a bit high water. I work in the cold wearing these and they do the job and then some, just a bit of issue with the fitting, still would highly recommend since the quality for the price is still great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Value and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Title: "Perfect Blend of Comfort and Style: PURE CHAMP Men's Fleece Joggers"Review:I recently picked up the PURE CHAMP Men's 3 Pack Fleece Joggers, and I must say, they've exceeded my expectations. The fit is absolutely spot-on, providing a snug yet comfortable experience, which is exactly what I look for in joggers. The thickness of the fleece is just right, offering enough warmth for cooler days without being overly heavy or bulky.What I appreciate the most is the balance between comfort and style. These joggers are versatile enough to be worn for a casual outing or just lounging around at home. The material feels soft against the skin, and the quality seems durable enough for regular wear.Overall, if you're on the hunt for a pair of joggers that don't compromise on comfort or style, the PURE CHAMP Men's Fleece Joggers are a fantastic choice. They're a staple in my wardrobe now, and I highly recommend them for anyone looking for that perfect pair of everyday joggers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So damn comfy
reviews.reviewText: I'm a jeans guy, almost all my pants are jeans. I find it difficult to find pants I feel comfortable wearing out that aren't made of denim, idk why. These pa ta have given me a confidence and a level of comfort that makes me want to wear them EVERYWHERE. They're soft, they're flexible, they're warm, they look cool, and the pockets are plentiful and spacious enough for me to carry my usual items (wallet, keys, and one extra pocket). I can't believe I got three pairs for ~10 dollars each, easily worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical about buying these due to the fact they have elastic around the bottoms. Kinda prefer my loungers to have more of a boot cut. But the size was spot on and the elastic was not too tight around the ankles. Pending complete disintegration after washing, I would highly recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value with Surprising Quality for the Price
reviews.reviewText: While these are not the nicest jogger sweatpants that I have every purchased, they might be the overall best combination of quality relative to the price I paid. Based on the size chart provided, I was deciding between ordering size L or XL. I went with the XL but may try the L if I order more in different colors.The waist band is constructed of a different material that is fairly thick and sturdy and not as stretchy as the rest of the pants. So if you're on the border between waist sizes you might want to order the larger size. However, the rest of the material is very stretchy so while I don't like my clothes to fit tightly, the pants are fairly big through the thighs. If you are between sizes and only worried about the hips or thighs I think you would be fine going with the smaller of the 2 sizes.There are a decent amount of color combination selections to choose from. I selected the 3 pack with Blue, Black and Charcoal, and I will definitely wear all 3 colors. However, the Blue is a very dark Navy Blue and is very similar to the Black color. I would have preferred them to be a little bit lighter color of blue. The pockets are large enough to hold my iPhone in a protective otter case and it's great that they have zippers.

Fits true to size. Comfortable and on the more fitted side. Nice tall cuffs and wasteband with thick cord drawstring.My wife tried to steal a pair from me permanently (said they fit her great with the cuffs rolled up), and I had to steal them back.
Me quedaron muy bien la talla chica, se ve de buen material y el diseño esta muy bien.
Very comfortable and sturdy. I like the fact that the draw string goes all the way around.
Compre en talla M y me quedaron muy bien.Vienen medio afelpados por dentro y son muy calientitos.
I like everything about these, the fit the colour and the sizing was right on.
